markdownRemark.html:
The Warewulf project is pleased to announce the release of v4.5.2, now available on GitHub.

Warewulf v4.5.2 is primarily a security fix release to address CVE-2024-3727.

Other fixes and changes already staged for v4.5.x are also included.

Let us know if you encounter any issues. v4.5.3 is already planned, and we intend to continue to improve and maintain the v4.5.x line while we continue working on the next major release, v4.6.0.

Thank you, as always, for being a part of the Warewulf community!
